title: Father, I Won’t Do Anything - Novel Updates
tags: Abandoned Children   Alchemy   Apathetic Protagonist   Beautiful Female Lead   Calm Protagonist   Carefree Protagonist   Child Abuse   Child Protagonist   Comedic Undertone   Depression   Doting Older Siblings   Dragons   European Ambience   Female Protagonist   Half-human Protagonist   Hated Protagonist   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Magic   Mature Protagonist   Reincarnation   Royalty   Single Parent   Wealthy Characters   Witches   Wizards
author: Jin Se Ha   진세하
description:
[Just as your birth didn’t inspire me, your death won’t mean anything to me.]
Jayna reincarnated as a supporting character who was born as mixed blood of human-dragon and died miserably after being neglected. 

She is branded as an unclean entity and was abandoned by the dragons.

And the first time she met her father, the lord of the tower, Diamide, he just looked at her coldly, as though he didn’t feel any sense of intimacy to his daughter as described in the original.

“Is that the one you called my daughter?”

Jayna flinched as he approached and lowered her sight.

“Blue eyes… but that’s not a proof that she’s my daughter. You could have brought me a child born with another human.”

And so he went back leaving her alone and Jayna was living in the shabby warehouse of the tower.

Rather than making vain efforts to get into the eyes of her father, the lord of the tower, she decided to have a small luxury that she had never experienced even in her previous life before her death.

“You don’t have to think of me as your daughter. I won’t call you ‘Father’ either.”

“…”

“Tower lord?”

So why is the father, who should’ve been indifferent, starting to get obsessed?

Father, can you just leave me alone?>
